channel.title: CVE Feed for Sayful Islam -- Filterable Portfolio

item.title: CVE-2024-4234|2024-04-26T12:57:12.988Z -- Sayful Islam -- Filterable Portfolio
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sayful Islam Filterable Portfolio allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Filterable Portfolio: from n/a through 1.6.4.
